item.title: Huge overflowing bins - public health hazard, 21st August
item.description:
These bins have been overflowing for close to a month with no collection, now people are leaving additional litter on the side of the bins because they are not getting picked up. Foxes and rodents are opening up the bags and it is disgusting.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alkham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Aldershot Road, queen’s lark, 21st August
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Aldershot Road, London

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Urinating in Datchworth Court stairwell, 21st August
item.description:
Someone is persistently urinating in the ground floor stair well that connects Theobolds and Datchworth Court. The whole stairwell reeks of urine. This started when the fob entry for the door was broken so anyone could access the stairwell

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Codicote Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden slats/planks are loose, 21st August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mast Quay, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Urinating in Datchworth Court stairwell, 21st August
item.description:
Someone who has access to Datchworth Court on Kings Crescent Estate is persistently urinating on the ground floor in the stair well. This has been going on for weeks and you can smell it from the top floor

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin bags dumped on top of leaf bags, 21st August
item.description:
Blue leaf bags have been piled up along Benhill Road for a while and now people are starting to dump their rubbish ok too, which the foxes are scattering everywhere.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Benhill Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Merrow Street, 21st August
item.description:
Lots of rubbish including old electrical goods have been flytipped in merrow Street. The waste has been there a while but in recent days has got much worse. Looks like lots of general litter as well. Seems unhygienic and it has been a while that it's still there. Seems like it's getting worse as well as people are treating it as an open bin area now. There's lots of kids in the area so the broken glass around the flytipped area also seems dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Merrow Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Tree, 21st August
item.description:
Tree in front garden is over-hanging the public pavement so that you have to duck right down to walk past or walk into the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grange Drive, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lorry idling everyday, 21st August
item.description:
The tesco lorry idles everyday outside flats on long lane, causing a nuisance in terms of noise and unnecessary air pollution. This has been continuing for over 3 months (prior to us moving in in May)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Long Lane, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, London
